attributes.action: justice for people wrongly accused of rape
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as a victim of this and have not yet bin cleared but know deep down and everyone who knows me would agree that im a innnocent man.now before being accused of this i was always very sympothetic for the woman who have been innocent victems..but since mine ordeal i cant seem to sympothise with some of these woman as i know that most of these claims are and could be false!.i have sat many nights now and wondered bout my career and whats going to happen to me,and have also wondered what the woman is and what! she is thinking..alls i want is some jutice so that no one has suffer the way i and many others have!

rejection.details: It is not clear what you are requesting that the Prime Minister does about this issue.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
